mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.reg_name AS "regName", a.status AS "status", a.tel AS "tel", a.addr AS "addr", a.memo AS "memo", a.image AS "image"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_company( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, reg_name, status, tel, addr, memo, image ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{regName}, #{status}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{memo}, #{image} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_company SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, reg_name = #{regName}, status = #{status}, tel = #{tel}, addr = #{addr}, memo = #{memo}, image = #{image} WHERE id = #{id}
